editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Breakfast nook, Laundry room, Master bath, Office, Pantry, Workshop, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: Come home to character! This is not your usual cookie cutter neighborhood. Very unique and desired area in Northern Glendale. Close proximity to ASU West, Thunderbird Banner hospital, and just about everything else that you can imagine. Home is directly across from a great family park with Racquetball, basketball, and two playgrounds. Home has been tastefully updated throughout and shows very nicely. Features include 4 bedrooms, 2 1/2 Bathrooms, Amazing master suite spans apx 24' in width with a cozy wood-burning fireplace, french doors to private deck with stairs to the pool area, large separate tub and shower, dual sinks, vanity and walk in closet. Large sunken living room with vaulted ceiling and window seat adjacent to the separate dining room/conversation room. Family room includes office area, custom wood cabinetry surrounding wood burning fireplace and lots of windows to view the backyard! Open eat in kitchen with Island and pantry that has just been remodeled with granite counter-tops, new under-mount sink and dark stained cabinetry! Breakfast nook bay window also looks out over the rear yard. New Kitchen Appliances in 2013! Newer 20' Porcelain Tile from entry, throughout traffic areas, dining room, kitchen, living room and bathrooms. Completely repainted exterior in 2014 with Dunn Edwards Paint. All new high efficiency toilets. Several new Low E-366 / Argon filled Windows. New Blinds in several rooms. High quality retractable sun shades on large porch area. Ceiling fans throughout. New Aluminum mailbox in 2013. RV parking. New Roof 2012. New pool fence 2013. Two nicer storage sheds on property. Three car garage. Fully automated irrigation for entire property. Beautifully landscaped yard, front and back, complete with vegetable garden, rose bushes, pomegranates, and other edible plants. Enjoy the sparkling blue pool with water fall in the summer!
response.whatOwnerLoves: Its hard to find such a neighborhood full of character and charm. Hickory Shadows demonstrates tranquility and comfort without being too far from all the necessities life demands. This home in within walking distance of Thunderbird Paseo Park & Trail System, Thunderbird Banner Hospital & several other medical and dental facilities, Fry's & Safeway Grocery, Banks & Dining as well as ASU West Campus. Marshal Ranch Elementary can be accessed by through Thunderbird Paseo Park Walking/Biking Trails. Within just a few miles are Thunderbird School of Global Management, Glendale Community College, Arrowhead Mall and Town-center, The 101 Freeway Loop, Interstate 17. We hope you love this are and home as much as we do!
